items.preText:
This again from Isam: "@Mahneel I didn't know Mahneel can comment on anything other than Mahmudullah?"

Around the wicket
items.text: length outside off and spinning back, cuts it straight to point
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: on the stumps, goes back and works it towards mid-on
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: slower in the air, length around off, Mushfiqur waits for it before turning it towards square leg
items.shortText: Bishoo to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: length, spinning in, punched back towards the bowler
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: fuller on the stumps, punched towards the left of the bowler who dives across to make a stop
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.preText: Hemant's got his break, and Saurabh Somani is back
items.text: comes forward to defend
items.shortText: Paul to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: good length ball on the stumps, played straight back, where mid-off collects
items.shortText: Paul to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: slower ball, popped up in the air with Rahim too early into the drive, but it went well clear of the bowler and well short of mid-on. They take the quick single
items.shortText: Paul to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: good length angling into the leftie and straightening a touch. Punched back to the bowler
items.shortText: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: tempts Shakib by throwing it wider of the stumps, but Shakib lashes at it and gets it through cover with good timing for a boundary
items.shortText: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: successive fours fuller length on the stumps, Shakib stands tall and punches it back past mid-on and into the fence
items.shortText: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.preText: Nishaanth: "I don't understand the mindset of batsmen these days. They think they can just take on any bowler however good/bad the delivery is once they had a decent start. Kl Rahul is been doing that for a few times and now Liton Das. They need to watch the videos of Bevan before coming to the crease."
items.text: top edged sweep lands safely not the right length to sweep perhaps, he went down on one knee to sweep it, the ball bounced higher than expected and took a top edge. However, fine leg was well back so it landed safe
items.shortText: Bishoo to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: short of a length, rocks back and cuts it powerfully through point
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, 2 runs

items.text: nails the slog-sweep but there is a man at the deep midwicket fence and though the ball was well timed, he collects it on the bounce to keep them to just  a single
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: good length, and he stays back and forces it through the offside. Not much turn for Bishoo
items.shortText: Bishoo to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: tossed up on a good length, gets it to turn into Shakib that time, who comes forward and pushes it towards point
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: flatter and a tad short, turning away from middle stump, he stays back and punches it to deep cover
items.shortText: Bishoo to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: back of a length on off and angling into the batsman, who defends watchfully from the crease
items.shortText: Roach to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: good bouncer, Mushfiqur gives in to the temptation to play it, gets too big on him and he rolls his wrist to keep it down from above his head. The ball drops at his feet and some nifty footwork by the batsman to stop it rolling back on the stumps
items.shortText: Roach to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: length ball angling in, he waits for it to come to the bat and opens the face to steer it past point
items.shortText: Roach to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

items.text: too full and from that angle over the wicket, it's easy pickings from the pads. Flicked to fine leg
items.shortText: Roach to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: short ball, and he goes for the pull. Aerial but played in the gap at square leg. Shakib hit it from above head height, so well controlled in the end
items.shortText: Roach to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: back of a length and into the batsman again, who runs it down to third man easily
items.shortText: Roach to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: tossed up outside off and turning back in sharply. He stays in his crease and late cuts it to backward point
items.shortText: Chase to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: goes too straight that time and he plays it with the turn to clip it to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Chase to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run
